Write an essay on one of the following. You must base your answer on the cultural options or literary
options you have studied in class. References to other subjects or literary works are permissible but should
not form the main body of your answer.

Language and culture

1.    With reference to your study of this option, explore the ways in which the speakers of one
      language/dialect can dominate another.


2.    With reference to language and culture, explore the advantages of being either multilingual
      or monolingual, indicating what you think is the ideal situation in terms of both communication and
      cultural identity.



Media and culture

3.    The Internet has transformed our lives. Discuss the ways in which the Internet has changed the nature
      of the mass media.


4.    Is censorship of the mass media ever justified or should the idea of free speech always be protected?  
      Discuss with reference to your study of the question.



Future issues

5.    In the next 50 years most people’s standard of living will improve. Do you agree or disagree with this
      statement?  Discuss with reference to your study of this option.



Global issues

6.    Identify one global issue that you think should be the centre of global attention and explain why you
      think this particular issue is of great importance.



Social issues

7.    Poverty is at the heart of many social issues. Identify one social issue that you have studied and show
      what part poverty plays in this issue.

Literary questions

8.    The places that people live in can influence their lives.  Discuss this statement with reference to at least
      two literary works you have studied.


9.    Consider the significance of the title, in relation to the work as a whole, in at least two literary works
      you have studied.


10.   The people encountered in the pages of a literary work may become role models for readers.
      With reference to at least two literary works you have studied, discuss characters or individuals who
      could be considered role models for young people.
